title: SMB - Commands
description: Represent a PackML state of an ISA S88 object

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be PackML

commandState.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Textual value of the result of the command

stateChangeTime.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. Date and time of this observation represented by an ISO8601 UTC format.

commandKey.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Name of the command

caller.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Name of the unit that called this command

elementType.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Type of the element

result.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Numeric value of the commandState

duration.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Numeric value of the durationtime in milliseconds

executer.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Complete treepath of the executing unit
